questions.question: The mechanism that allows for a function call to be written before its declaration.
The context in which values are visible or can be referenced.
Template object that an object inherits methods and properties from.
The combination of a function with reference to its lexical environment.
Data descriptor key that allows a property in an object to be changed with an assignment operator.
A function or algorithm that calls itself one or more times until a specified condition is met.
Time required for a function to execute based on its input size.
A form of automatic memory management which reclaims memory occupied by objects that are no longer in use by the program.
Optimization technique used primarily to speed up computer programs by storing the results of expensive function calls and returning the cached result when the same inputs occur again
In this data structure, for any given node C, if P is a parent node of C, then the key (the value) of P is greater than or equal to the key of C.
Computer program or a device that provides functionality for other programs or devices, called "clients".
An application layer protocol for distributed, collaborative, hypermedia information systems.
A small piece of data sent from a website and stored on the user's computer by the user's web browser while the user is browsing.
Refers to the management of incremental, reversible changes and version control for relational database schemas.
A device that acts as a reverse proxy and distributes network or application traffic across a number of servers.
The API to a webpage, allowing programs to read and manipulate the page content, structure, and styles.
Describes all HTML elements, and includes content, padding, border and margin.
Elements that clearly describe their meaning to both the browser and the developer, as well as providing enhanced accessibility.
A React hook which serves the same purpose as componentDidMount, componentDidUpdate, and componentWillUnmount did in class‚Äîbased React, but unified into a single API.
A JavaScript API for rendering interactive 2D and 3D graphics within any compatible web browser.
The strength of the relationships between inter-dependent modules vs the degree to which the elements inside a module belong together.
The process of injecting a function with number of prepared arguments in order to produce a subsequent function of lesser arity.
Style of programming that enables the instantiation of functions and data structures when their specified types are provided as parameters.
Let q(x) be a property provable about objects x of type T. Then q(y) should be provable for objects y of type S where S is a subtype of T

A system design principle that deals with the inter-relationships of components‚Äîa system should provide components that can be selected and assembled in various combinations to satisfy specific user requirements.
